text:
Just wanted to let you know that the webwork system (http://sourceforge.net/projects/webwork/)
is not installable with the latest nightly build (20010111).
XML parsing error.
erik
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text:
The 0.9 version of webwork has an invalid web.xml file -- it has the
<welcome-file-list> element before the <servlet> entry, which violates the
DTD requirements.  Tomcat 3.2 didn't use a validating XML parse, but
Tomcat 4.0 does, and (correctly) rejects this deployment descriptor.
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
